import React, { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import '../App.css' import { MDBContainer, MDBTabPane, MDBTabContent, MDBNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink } from "mdbreact"; import { fetchRecord, fetchProducts, fetchFashion } from '../actions/index' import {connect} from 'react-redux' function TabsDefault(props) { const [activeItem, setItem] = useState("1") useEffect(() => { props.fetchProducts(); }) const toggle = (tab) => { if (this.state.activeItem !== tab) { this.setState({ activeItem: tab }); } }; return ( toggle("1")} role="tab" > All toggle("2",this.props.fetchFashion())} role="tab" > Fashion this.toggle("3",this.props.fetchRecord("electronics"))} role="tab" > Electronics
{products[0] && products[0].map(products => (
New

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}

{products[2] && products[2].map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
); } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ fetchProducts: () => { dispatch(fetchProducts()) }, fetchRecord: (search) => { dispatch(fetchRecord(search)) }, fetchFashion: () => { dispatch(fetchFashion()) } }) const mapStateToProps = state => { // console.log(state); return { products: state.products } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps) (TabsDefault);
